sections.title: See also

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The 'See also' section typically serves as a navigation aid, suggesting related topics that may not need citations within the section itself. As it simply lists a related term without making any claims or statements, citations are not required here.

The 'See also' section does not contain specific claims that would require inline citations. It is meant for listing related topics, not providing detailed information or claims that necessitate citations.
There are no direct quotes in the 'See also' section as it only lists a related term with no specific text that would warrant quoting or the need for citations of quotes.
The content does not contain statements that are challenged or likely to be challenged, as it merely links to a related topic without making any disputes or contentious statements.
The section is not meant to be dense with citations because it serves as a navigational tool pointing readers to related topics, not detailing or discussing the topic in depth.

sections.meta_notes: The 'See also' section is appropriately formatted as a list of related topics. It does not necessitate citations or elaborate discourse, consistent with its purpose to aid in navigation.
